FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard Moodle primary key.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the course this quiz is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Quiz name.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Quiz introduction text.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Quiz intro text format.

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz opens. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz closes. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: The time limit for quiz attempts, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: overduehandling
FIELD.COMMENT: The method used to handle overdue attempts. 'autosubmit', 'graceperiod' or 'autoabandon'.

FIELD.NAME: graceperiod
FIELD.COMMENT: The amount of time (in seconds) after the time limit runs out during which attempts can still be submitted, if overduehandling is set to allow it.

FIELD.NAME: preferredbehaviour
FIELD.COMMENT: The behaviour to ask questions to use.

FIELD.NAME: attempts
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum number of attempts a student is allowed.

FIELD.NAME: attemptonlast
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether subsequent attempts start from teh answer to the previous attempt (1) or start blank (0).

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: One of the values QUIZ_GRADEHIGHEST, QUIZ_GRADEAVERAGE, QUIZ_ATTEMPTFIRST or QUIZ_ATTEMPTLAST.

FIELD.NAME: decimalpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of decimal points to use when displaying grades.

FIELD.NAME: questiondecimalpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of decimal points to use when displaying question grades. (-1 means use decimalpoints.)

FIELD.NAME: reviewattempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. This is a bit field, decoded by the mod_quiz_display_options class. It is formed by ORing together the constants defined there.

FIELD.NAME: reviewcorrectness
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewmarks
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewspecificfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewgeneralfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewrightanswer
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewoverallfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: questionsperpage
FIELD.COMMENT: How often to insert a page break when editing the quiz, or when shuffling the question order.

FIELD.NAME: navmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Any constraints on how the user is allowed to navigate around the quiz. Currently recognised values are 'free' and 'seq'.

FIELD.NAME: shufflequestions
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the question order should be shuffled for each attempt.

FIELD.NAME: shuffleanswers
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the parts of the question should be shuffled, in those question types that support it.

FIELD.NAME: questions
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of question ids, with 0s for page breaks. The quiz layout. See also the quiz_question_instances table.

FIELD.NAME: sumgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: The total of all the question instance maxmarks.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The total that the quiz overall grade is scaled to be out of.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when the quiz was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last modified time.

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: A password that the student must enter before starting or continuing a quiz attempt.

FIELD.NAME: subnet
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to restrict the IP addresses from which this quiz can be attempted. The format is as requried by the address_in_subnet function.

FIELD.NAME: browsersecurity
FIELD.COMMENT: Restriciton on the browser the student must use. E.g. 'securewindow'.

FIELD.NAME: delay1
FIELD.COMMENT: Delay that must be left between the first and second attempt, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: delay2
FIELD.COMMENT: Delay that must be left between the second and subsequent attempt, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: showuserpicture
FIELD.COMMENT: Option to show the user's picture during the attempt and on the review page.

FIELD.NAME: showblocks
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether blocks should be shown on the attempt.php and review.php pages.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard Moodle primary key.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the quiz that was attempted.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user whose attempt this is.

FIELD.NAME: attempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Sequentially numbers this student's attempts at this quiz.

FIELD.NAME: uniqueid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the question_usage that holds the details of the the question_attempts that make up this quiz attempt.

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The current state of the attempts. 'inprogress', 'overdue', 'finished' or 'abandoned'.

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was started.

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was submitted. 0 if the attempt has not been submitted yet.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last modified time.

FIELD.NAME: timecheckstate
FIELD.COMMENT: Next time quiz cron should check attempt for state changes. NULL means never check.

FIELD.NAME: sumgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: Total marks for this attempt.

FIELD.NAME: needsupgradetonewqe
FIELD.COMMENT: Used during the upgrade from Moodle 2.0 to 2.1. This will be removed in the future.

TABLE.NAME: quiz_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the overall grade for each user on the quiz, based on their various attempts and the quiz.grademethod setting.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references user.id.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The overall grade from the quiz. Not affected by overrides in the gradebook.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this grade changed.

TABLE.NAME: quiz_question_instances
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the maximum possible grade (weight) for each question used in a quiz.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id.

FIELD.NAME: question
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references question.id.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: How many marks this question contributes to quiz.sumgrades.

TABLE.NAME: quiz_feedback
TABLE.COMMENT: Feedback given to students based on which grade band their overall score lies.

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id.

FIELD.NAME: feedbacktext
FIELD.COMMENT: The feedback to show for a attempt where mingrade <= attempt grade < maxgrade. See function quiz_feedback_for_grade in mod/quiz/locallib.php.

FIELD.NAME: mingrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The lower limit of this grade band. Inclusive.

FIELD.NAME: maxgrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The upper limit of this grade band. Exclusive.

TABLE.NAME: quiz_overrides
TABLE.COMMENT: The overrides to quiz settings on a per-user and per-group basis.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references groups.id. Can be null if this is a per-user override.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references user.id. Can be null if this is a per-group override.

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: Time at which students may start attempting this quiz. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: Time by which students must have completed their attempt. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Time limit in seconds. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: Quiz password. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

TABLE.NAME: quiz_reports
TABLE.COMMENT: Lists all the installed quiz reports and their display order and so on. No need to worry about deleting old records. Only records with an equivalent directory are displayed.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name of the report, same as the directory name

FIELD.NAME: displayorder
FIELD.COMMENT: display order for report tabs

FIELD.NAME: capability
FIELD.COMMENT: Capability required to see this report. May be blank which means use the default of mod/quiz:viewreport. This is used when deciding which tabs to render.
